            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_2" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Foreign currency markets are dynamic. Capture opportunities from exchange rate movements to grow your wealth potential. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Deposit Plus tip: Set up rollover instructions and adjust the rollover amount at ease on fixing date, regardless of the deposit or linked currency you are receiving on maturity!</p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_3" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can set the monthly spending limit on your HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card via the HSBC HK App . Simply log on and go to the account that your debit card is linked to. You can adjust your limit under 'Manage debit cards'. The limit you set will be effective immediately and you will receive both SMS and email notification on the limit change. But we won’t include the following:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Recurring transactions, e.g. telecom and utility subscriptions, standing orders and Direct Debits</li>
 <li>Deposits in your linked bank account</li>
 <li>Transactions where the posting amount exceeds the authorisation amount such as when there's exchange rate fluctuation</li>
 <li>Approved transactions that have been posted late</li>
 <li>Transactions approved by card schemes directly</li>
 <li>Other fees (e.g. annual fees, interest and finance charges) if applicable, per our Bank Tariff Guide on <a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/" target="_self">our website</a></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that your card carries a pre-set daily spending limit of HKD50,000 (or HKD100,000 if it's an HSBC Global Private Banking Mastercard® Debit Card / HSBC Jade Mastercard® Debit Card). This limit is shared across all your purchase transactions, including EPS.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Both monthly spending limit and daily spending limit are effective at the same time while the lower limit shall prevail.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_1" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            What is Deposit Plus?
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_8" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Deposit Plus gives you the opportunity to enjoy potentially higher interest returns by integrating time deposit and <span style="font-family: "HSBC Univers Next Regular", "HSBC Neue Helvetica Regular"; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; background-color: transparent;">foreign currency options.</span></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Features :</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Higher interest return potential compared to regular time deposits</li> 
 <li>Balanced risk exposure with relatively lower volatility compared to equities</li> 
 <li>Favourable exchange rate generally lower than the spot exchange rate at the time when you place the deposit<sup><a href="#3"><span aria-hidden="true">3</span><span class="visuallyhidden">3 view footnote 3</span></a></sup></li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_2" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            How does Deposit Plus suit you?
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_9" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You might find Deposit Plus particularly suitable if:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li> You are comfortable with a low to medium level of risk</li> 
 <li>You would like to enjoy potentially higher interest returns with the selected currencies or have currency needs for practical reasons (e.g. family members living overseas or children studying abroad)</li> 
 <li>You have experience in foreign currency investments</li> 
 <li>You understand that loss may be incurred as a result of depreciation in the value of the currency paid</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The foreign currency exchange market is dynamic. To help you respond swiftly and capture opportunities as they arise, HSBC's Wealth Management provides you with a 24-hour online and mobile platform<sup><a href="#6"><span aria-hidden="true">6</span><span class="visuallyhidden">6 view footnote 6</span></a></sup> for trading Deposit Plus. Grasp opportunities now to grow your wealth <span style="font-family: "HSBC Univers Next Regular", "HSBC Neue Helvetica Regular"; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; background-color: transparent;">potential anywhere, at any time.</span></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">By taking advantage of exchange rate movements, enhance yield potential by increasing your interest above that of time deposits</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>24 hours a day, the longest trading hours in town<sup><a href="#6"><span aria-hidden="true">6</span><span class="visuallyhidden">6 view footnote 6</span></a></sup></li> 
 <li>Access to real-time market information and technical analysis to help you make informed decisions</li> 
 <li>Comprehensive rate tables showing interest rates of different currency pairs and tenors at a glance</li> 
 <li>11 currency choices<sup><a href="#7"><span aria-hidden="true">7</span><span class="visuallyhidden">7 view footnote 7</span></a></sup> to pair up as deposit and linked currencies even with cross-currency pairs</li> 
 <li>Enjoy the flexibility to set your own conversion rate, interest rate and tenor to best suit your needs</li> 
 <li>Get instant price quote of various currency pairs with different tenors and conversion rates</li> 
 <li>Place similar orders based on transaction history</li> 
 <li>Minimum deposit amount as low as HKD5,000</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_14">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_15" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Foreign currency markets are dynamic. Capture opportunities from exchange rate movements to grow your wealth potential. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Deposit Plus tip: Set up rollover instructions and adjust the rollover amount at ease on fixing date, regardless of the deposit or linked currency you are receiving on maturity!</p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_16" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can set the monthly spending limit on your HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card via the HSBC HK App . Simply log on and go to the account that your debit card is linked to. You can adjust your limit under 'Manage debit cards'. The limit you set will be effective immediately and you will receive both SMS and email notification on the limit change. But we won’t include the following:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Recurring transactions, e.g. telecom and utility subscriptions, standing orders and Direct Debits</li>
 <li>Deposits in your linked bank account</li>
 <li>Transactions where the posting amount exceeds the authorisation amount such as when there's exchange rate fluctuation</li>
 <li>Approved transactions that have been posted late</li>
 <li>Transactions approved by card schemes directly</li>
 <li>Other fees (e.g. annual fees, interest and finance charges) if applicable, per our Bank Tariff Guide on <a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/" target="_self">our website</a></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that your card carries a pre-set daily spending limit of HKD50,000 (or HKD100,000 if it's an HSBC Global Private Banking Mastercard® Debit Card / HSBC Jade Mastercard® Debit Card). This limit is shared across all your purchase transactions, including EPS.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Both monthly spending limit and daily spending limit are effective at the same time while the lower limit shall prevail.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_5" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            What is Deposit Plus?
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_21" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Deposit Plus gives you the opportunity to enjoy potentially higher interest returns by integrating time deposit and <span style="font-family: "HSBC Univers Next Regular", "HSBC Neue Helvetica Regular"; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; background-color: transparent;">foreign currency options.</span></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Features :</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Higher interest return potential compared to regular time deposits</li> 
 <li>Balanced risk exposure with relatively lower volatility compared to equities</li> 
 <li>Favourable exchange rate generally lower than the spot exchange rate at the time when you place the deposit<sup><a href="#3"><span aria-hidden="true">3</span><span class="visuallyhidden">3 view footnote 3</span></a></sup></li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_6" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            How does Deposit Plus suit you?
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_22" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You might find Deposit Plus particularly suitable if:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li> You are comfortable with a low to medium level of risk</li> 
 <li>You would like to enjoy potentially higher interest returns with the selected currencies or have currency needs for practical reasons (e.g. family members living overseas or children studying abroad)</li> 
 <li>You have experience in foreign currency investments</li> 
 <li>You understand that loss may be incurred as a result of depreciation in the value of the currency paid</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The foreign currency exchange market is dynamic. Grasp opportunities now to grow your wealth <span style="font-family: "HSBC Univers Next Regular", "HSBC Neue Helvetica Regular"; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; background-color: transparent;">potential anywhere, at any time.</span></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">By taking advantage of exchange rate movements, enhance yield potential by increasing your interest above that of time deposits</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>24 hours a day, the longest trading hours in town<sup><a href="#6"><span aria-hidden="true">6</span><span class="visuallyhidden">6 view footnote 6</span></a></sup></li> 
 <li>Access to real-time market information and technical analysis to help you make informed decisions</li> 
 <li>Comprehensive rate tables showing interest rates of different currency pairs and tenors at a glance</li> 
 <li>11 currency choices<sup><a href="#7"><span aria-hidden="true">7</span><span class="visuallyhidden">7 view footnote 7</span></a></sup> to pair up as deposit and linked currencies even with cross-currency pairs</li> 
 <li>Enjoy the flexibility to set your own conversion rate, interest rate and tenor to best suit your needs</li> 
 <li>Get instant price quote of various currency pairs with different tenors and conversion rates</li> 
 <li>Place similar orders based on transaction history</li> 
 <li>Minimum deposit amount as low as HKD5,000</li> 
</ul>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_9">
    
    

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            How to get started?
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_28" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">3 simple steps to place your Deposit Plus:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Choose your<br>         Deposit currency<br>         Linked currency<br>         11 currencies including AUD, CAD, CHF, CNY, EUR, GBP, HKD, JPY, NZD, SGD and USD</li> 
 <li>Enter deposit amount<br>     Choose deposit period (1 week to 3 months)</li> 
 <li>Set your desired conversion rate or interest rate</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">At maturity<sup><a href="#4"><span aria-hidden="true">4</span><span class="visuallyhidden">4 view footnote 4</span></a></sup>, receive principal and interest in the deposit currency or convert principal and interest to the linked currency at the predetermined conversion rate<sup><a href="#5"><span aria-hidden="true">5</span><span class="visuallyhidden">5 view footnote 5</span></a></sup></p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_10">
    
    

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Act now to capture Deposit Plus opportunities
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_29" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Set up Deposit Plus through HSBC Internet banking and HSBC HK App.<br> You can also visit any HSBC branch or call <a href="tel:+852-2233-3733" class="no-link" role="presentation">2233 3733</a>.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_30" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <div>
 <strong>Risk Disclosure</strong>
</div> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Not a time deposit – Deposit Plus is NOT equivalent to, nor should it be treated as a substitute for, time deposit. It is NOT a protected deposit and is NOT protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong.<br> </li> 
 <li>Derivatives risk – Deposit Plus is embedded with FX option(s). Option transactions involve risks, especially when selling an option. Although the premium received from selling an option is fixed, you may sustain a loss well in excess of such premium amount, and your loss could be substantial.</li> 
 <li>Limited potential gain – The maximum potential gain is limited to the interest on the deposit.</li> 
 <li>Maximum potential loss – Deposit Plus is not principal protected. You must be prepared to incur loss as a result of depreciation in the value of the currency paid (if the deposit is converted to the linked currency at maturity). Such loss may offset the interest earned on the deposit and may even result in losses in the principal amount of the deposit.</li> 
 <li>Not the same as buying the linked currency – Investing in Deposit Plus is not the same as buying the linked currency directly.</li> 
 <li>Market risk – The net return of Deposit Plus will depend upon the exchange rate of the deposit currency against the linked currency prevailing at the deposit fixing time on the deposit fixing date. Movements in exchange rates can be unpredictable, sudden and drastic, and affected by complex political and economic factors.</li> 
 <li>Liquidity risk – Deposit Plus is designed to be held until maturity. You do not have a right to request early termination of this product before maturity. Under special circumstances, the Bank has the right to accept your early redemption request at its sole discretion and on a case by case basis. The Bank will provide an indication of the redemption price upon such request. Your return upon such early redemption will likely be lower than that if the deposit were held until maturity and may be negative.</li> 
 <li>Credit risk of the Bank – Deposit Plus is not secured by any collateral. When you invest in this product, you will be relying on the Bank's creditworthiness. If the Bank becomes insolvent or defaults on its obligations under this product, you can only claim as an unsecured creditor of the Bank. In the worst case, you could suffer a total loss of your deposit amount.</li> 
 <li>Currency risk – If the deposit currency and/or linked currency is not your home currency, and you choose to convert it back to your home currency upon maturity, you may make a gain or loss due to exchange rate fluctuations.</li> 
 <li>Risks relating to RMB - You should note that the value of RMB against other foreign currencies fluctuates and will be affected by, amongst other things, the PRC government's control (for example, the PRC government regulates conversion between RMB and foreign currencies), which may adversely affect your return under this product. The value of your investment will be subject to the risk of exchange rate fluctuation. In case you receive RMB as Linked Currency at maturity and you choose to convert your maturity proceed to other currencies, you may suffer loss in principal. This product will be denominated (if Deposit Currency being RMB) and settled (when receive RMB at maturity) in RMB deliverable in Hong Kong, which is different from that of RMB deliverable in Mainland China.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Investment invoices risks and past performance is not indicative of future performance.  The above information is prepared for general information purposes only.  It cannot be construed as an offer or recommendation by the bank and HSBC shall not be held liable for damages arising out of any person's reliance upon this information.  Any person considering an investment should seek independent advice on the suitability or otherwise of the particular investment.  The bank has prepared this document based on information obtained from sources it reasonably believes to be reliable.  However, the bank does not warrant, guarantee or represent, expressly or by implication, the accuracy, validity or completeness of such information.</p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_31" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL"><a id="1"></a>1. The above interest rates are indicative only. They are not guaranteed and are subject to revision as per prevailing market conditions.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL"><a id="2"></a>2. Currency pairs in this table are ranked in descending order according to transaction volume as recorded by HSBC in Hong Kong during the specified period.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL"><a id="3"></a>3. Currency conversion only takes place when the linked currency weakens against the deposit currency as compared to the pre-determined conversion rate on the fixing date, and may suffer loss if currency conversion takes place.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL"><a id="4"></a>4. Determined by the exchange rate on the fixing date<br> </p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL"><a id="5"></a>5. May suffer loss if you convert the proceeds to the deposit currency at the spot rate immediately.</p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL"><a id="6"></a>6.  Customers can trade from Monday 6 am to Saturday 5 am except for system maintenance periods from 9 pm to 9.30pm and 5.20am to 5.35am Monday to Friday and public holidays in Hong Kong.</p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL"><a id="7"></a>7. Currency choices include AUD, CAD, CHF, CNY, EUR, GBP, HKD, JPY, NZD, SGD and USD.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL">This document does not constitute an offer for the purchase or sale of any investment products. You should carefully consider whether any investment products or services mentioned herein are appropriate for you in view of your investment experience, objectives, financial resources and circumstances.</p>
</div></div>
